alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 4:21AM EST until December 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow, gusty winds, blowing snow and falling temperatures expected. Total snow accumulations are only expected to range from 1 to 3 inches. Strong northwest winds gusting to 40 to 50 mph, strongest along the lakeshore to the east of Munising, will create blowing snow. Temperatures rapidly falling from the 30s early this morning into the lower 20s by late morning could lead to flash freezing of water and slush on roadways. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
